asset.author: iRobot
asset.hookText:
See the full episode at http://video.pbs.org/video/1362796843
Co-founder, chief executive officer and chairman of the board of iRobot Corporation, maker of the Roomba vacuum cleaning robot and the PackBot military robot/sports enthusiast who actively participates in everything from rock climbing to snowboarding to kayaking, and more. Watch more of Colin's videos on our website http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/nova/secretlife/
